message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.

Hi Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the recommendation, but I believe I can find something similar elsewhere within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $165. It's a great price, considering the unique features and quality of the product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the compromise, I still believe there might be room for further negotiation. I am willing to pay $155 for the product.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $160. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. I'll sell the product to you for $160. It's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your effort in meeting halfway, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget, I am willing to pay $157 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $159. This is the lowest I'm willing to go.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $158 for the product, which I believe is a fair price considering its value.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $157. This is the lowest I'm willing to go.
